name: Accu-Steel
description: A design build firm specializing in commercial building construction.

info.heading: How I Helped
info.info: Originally they were calculating building estimates via a custom spreadsheet with thousands of equations and formulas. I ported all of those equations to JavaScript and built them a custom dashboard/estimate calculator that they could have dealers log into on their computer, phone, or tablet to create and manage estimates.

name: The Art of Education University
description: An accredited online university geared towards art teachers.

info.heading: How I Helped
list: Configured and maintained multiple servers behind a load-balancer to ensure high-availability
Set up non-static uploads to be uploaded to and served from AWS S3 buckets
Asisted with a custom ledger system to track user's payments
Miscellaneous back-end and front-end work

name: Count The Kicks
description: An evidence-based stillbirth prevention and awareness program that teaches expectant parents the method for, and importance of, tracking fetal movement daily during the third trimester of pregnancy.

info.heading: How I Helped
list: Configured and maintained Linux server running Apache HTTPD
Miscellaneous back-end and front-end work

name: Happy Boards
description: A customizable way to share messages on TV, making offices, events & schools happier.

info.heading: How I Helped
list: Developed and maintained custom Android-based firmware
Created a system for updating custom firmware on devices remotely
Went on-site to set up digital signage hardware for clients
Managed and maintained the Linux servers that ran both the software and database
Implemented custom APIs for pulling data from various social media networks
Contributed to sales pitch meetings with potential clients
Assisted client IT teams with gettind devices working with their internal networks and firewalls

name: Iowa Finance Authority
description: Iowa's one stop source for homeownership, affordable rental, water quality and title guaranty expertise.

info.heading: How I Helped
list: Set up a remote MySQL database server that was encrypted via LUKS at rest and SSL during transit
Configured and maintained Linux server running Apache HTTPD
Miscellaneous back-end and front-end work

name: The Mom's Society
description: An engaging online community where moms can connect, share experiences, give and get advice, and access the information or recommendations they need and want.

info.heading: How I Helped
list: Built a mobile application for both Android and iOS
Built a number of custom WordPress plugins for users to make posts, comments, follow each other, typical social media functionality
Built custom API endpoints for the mobile app to connect to
Configured and maintained Linux server running Apache HTTPD
Miscellaneous back-end and front-end work

name: Studio 629
description: The perfect spot for a creative, collaborative work space. Beautiful natural light, super communicative host, and comfortable atmosphere.
